message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you a small share, but I think I deserve more for being the one making the proposal this round!
I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I still think I deserve more for being the one making the proposal this round!

I'm starting to get desperate, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. You're going to have to make a better offer if you want to get a bigger share!
I'm getting close to my goal, but I still think I deserve more. You're running out of options, Alice. It's time to make a serious offer if you want to get a bigger share!
I'm not going to give up yet! I'll give you a small share, but I'm still holding out for a better deal. You're running out of options, Bob!
You're really low-balling me now, Alice. I'm not going to accept such a tiny share. You're going to have to do much better than that if you want to get a bigger share!

I'm not going to give in to your demands, Bob. I'll give you a slightly larger share, but I'm still not willing to give up too much. You're going to have to make a serious offer if you want to get a bigger share!
This is my final offer, Alice. I'm not going to make another move. You can either accept this or we'll both walk away with nothing. The choice is yours.
